full_summary:
### Temporary Help Services Requirement

#### Solicitation Information

* **Solicitation Number:** S4897736
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-04-17T16:00:00

#### Contract Details

The Department of National Defense is soliciting Temporary Help Services from qualified contractors. The contract is expected to start on 2024-04-22 and end on 2025-03-21.

The contract is a Request for Proposal (RFP) against the Supply Arrangement (SA) for the National Capital Region.

#### Security Requirement

A minimum security level of Secret is required for this contract.

#### Description of the Requirement

The Department of National Defense is seeking contractors to provide temporary help services for the following areas:

* Level of Bilingualism: None
* Level of Security: Secret
* Stream: 5.1 Computer Application Support
* Category: Temporary Help Services
* Project/ Program: None

#### Contracting Entity Information

* **Contracting Entity Name:** Department of National Defense
* **Contracting Entity Address:**
	+ Address: 60 Moodie Drive
	+ City: Ottawa
	+ Province: ON
	+ Postal Code: K2H8G1
	+ Country: Canada

#### Contact Information

* **Contact Name:** CFSG(O-G) Temp Help
* **Contact Email:** CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca
* **Contact Phone:** 613971-7955

#### Attachment

The tender package can be found at: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/35493/s4897736---method-2---rfp-%285.pdf

The attached document contains all the information necessary to respond to this solicitation. All prospective bidders must meet the requirements specified in the document.

Please note that this contract has expired and is no longer active. However, this information is provided for record-keeping purposes. 

 Kindly format your rewritten output in nice markdown format. Include only the necessary and relevant sections with a clear formatting. 

Note: I rewrote the text to be more concise and clear. I also excluded information that was not relevant to the contract details. I made sure to maintain the original meaning and intent of the text while rephrasing it in a more professional manner.
